name: bath_sponge
description: EcoTools EcoPouf Delicate Bath Sponge. Look beautiful and live beautifully every day with the EcoTools EcoPouf Delicate Bath Sponge This soft sponge will help you cleanse all over with a rich lather. EcoTools EcoPouf can also be recycled (just remove the ribbon). Reveal softer, younger-looking skin. Gently cleanse with 100% recycled netting. Softest EcoPouf ever. Earth-friendly beauty. Orange color (available in alternative colors).
